title: I got punished for not being offensive to the guy the enemy that was flaming and reported me .
body:

Does anyone else reading this chat believe that i really deserve a 10-chat restriction ?

replies.body:
"Maybe %%% is offensive that it is nothign compared to what he said to me"

We aren't comparing it to what he said to you. You are each held accountable for what you said, not what the other said.

Also, "reported" is considered harassment and negative, saying that will almost always lead to someone trolling if said in a stressful environment, as now they already know you will report them so they have nothing to lose. At least that is their flawed logic.

You talk too much.
Unsportsmanlike/disrespectful, and possible hatespeech/homophobic slang depending on what that censored word is.
There is a zero-tolerance (read: instant permaban-worthy) policy for hatespeech/homophobia/other similar types of language (racism, any other type of X-phobic speech, etc)

You deserved it.

Are you joking mate? I talk too much? http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1527368717/25465326?tab=overview . See the match duration . I sent like 28 messages in 36 mins . The censored word was "fg"

So what? You said too many unnecessary things as well as hatespeech which falls under homophobia which can warrant an instant first-strike permaban.
You deserved it. Stop complaining.

How is a word "fg" hatespeech? A lot of gay people call themselves like that...

here xd
That's not really for you to decide.
What isn't?Lol, this society is so fcked up.This same thing as when black people are using the "N" word all the time but when someone else say it it's the worst thing ever.
Right, but if they take offense, that's on them and you're in the wrong... You don't just choose what is and isn't offensive for everyone else.

use it and expect yourself to get punished.

Just because you don't find it offensive doesn't mean everyone thinks like you. It's generally considered offensive and in any case both of you need to be punished.

Riot only send the most recent(s) chat logs. You may have been toxic in other games too which also factor in whether you get punished or not.
Unjustified mutes/bans are extremely rare and according to that chat log, if you have this kind of attitude in all or most of your games, it is a well-deserved mute.

Look back at the chat log and pretend you were actually having that conversation on a basketball court with other players or whichever other group activity you enjoy. Realize just how toxic you sound.
